attributes.action: not to under any circunstances give away any off my bbc licence fee ITV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I don't want any commercial TV station
to recieve any part of my licence fee
no matter what justification is put forward
This would be what I regard as the thin edge of the wedge leading to my taxes subsiding any commercial TV  company's that have been badly managed in the past

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
